definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, [[פָּעֳלוֹ]] his work in providence De 32:4, Is 5:12, Job 36:24; in deliverance Ps 44:2 (as acc. cogn.), Ps 77:13 + 5 t.; in judgment Ps 64:10, Ps 95:9, as acc. cogn. Hb Hab 1:5.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of men, daily toil Job 24:5, Ps 104:23; specif. act Ru 2:12; [[יׇדָיו]] ´[[פ]] of sacrificing De 33:11; pl. of achievements 2Sa 23:20 = 1Ch 11:32; action as having moral quality Job 34:11, Pr 20:11, Pr 24:12, Pr 24:29, evil implied Je 25:14, Je 50:29, Job 36:9, Ps 28:4, [[כַּפָּיו]] ´[[פ]] 9:17; [[חָמָס]] ´[[מ]] Is 59:6; good action Pr 21:8.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: by hands of God Is 45:9, Is 45:11 (of men).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: by man Is 1:31 (i.e. prob. his idol Ges Che:comm. Di al.; > read [[בַּעֲלוֹ]] Lag:Sem. i. 5 Sta:ZAW iii (1888), 12f.).
